home.lp-p1: You can control your smart home because of IDOM web application
home.lp-p2: Join us and see how simple it is
home.rp-p: Great! Sign in to take full advantage of a smart home facilities.

board.p: Your smart home is ready to work. Select a category and let it run.

actions.act-sensor-between: Action when sensor detects a given value between selected hours
